entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
